column.p: A ball is suspended from a spring 20 cm above ground and bounces down to the ground and back up repeatedly. It takes 4 seconds to complete 5 cycles.
Q: Find a sinusoidal function that represents the height of the ball in terms of time and graph one cycle of the sinusoid.
Initial graph: y = 5 cos (180x) + 5 is in the form of y = a cos (kx) + d
